description:
The second season of BanG Dream!.

It's a new school year and Kasumi, Arisa, Saaya, Tae, and Rimi are thrilled to finally be second-year students. Even more exciting than becoming upperclassmen, however, is the fun they have while performing in their band Poppin' Party… until things get out of control when the girls publicly announce that they're going to do their own concert before they've really studied the issue.

Suddenly they're committed to doing something that's a lot more difficult than it seemed, and the pressure is doubled since their musical rivals in Roselia, who've also announced a live concert, are way ahead of them in planning! But you can't stop the music, and with a little hard work and help from other groups and some talented newcomers, Poppin' Party fever will soon be popping up all over!

(Source: Sentai Filmworks)

tags.name: Chuunibyou
tags.description: Prominently features a character with "Middle School 2nd Year Syndrome", who either acts like a know-it-all adult or falsely believes they have special powers.

tags.name: Gyaru
tags.description: Prominently features a female character who has a distinct American-emulated fashion style, such as tanned skin, bleached hair, and excessive makeup. Also known as gal.

node.description: **Iida Satoki** is a Japanese freelance sound director.

RAISE A SUILEN is an all-girl band in the BanG Dream! franchise. The group consists of five members:
- [Raychell](https://anilist.co/staff/137051/Raychell) (as [LAYER](https://anilist.co/character/136983/Rei-Wakana)) on lead vocals and bass
- [Riko Kohara](https://anilist.co/staff/120173/Riko-Kohara) (as [LOCK](https://anilist.co/character/133744/Rokka-Asahi)) on guitar
- [Natsume](https://anilist.co/staff/137052/Natsume) (as [MASKING](https://anilist.co/character/136984/Masuki-Satou)) on drums
- [Reo Kurachi](https://anilist.co/staff/137053/Reo-Kurachi) (as [PAREO](https://anilist.co/character/136985/Reona-Nyubara)) on keyboard
- [Risa Tsumugi](https://anilist.co/staff/137054/Risa-Tsumugi) (as [CHU²](https://anilist.co/character/136986/Chiyu-Tamade)) as DJ

They were tentatively given the name THE THIRD(仮) before getting their official name. The group was initially formed as a backup band for the vocalists of Afterglow, Pastel*Palettes, and Hello, Happy World! due to them being unable to play their characters' instruments. It was then revealed during the second live that THE THIRD has officially become part of the franchise, along with a new name, RAISE A SUILEN, and a newly recruited member, Risa Tsumugi.

edges.role: Theme Song Performance (OP eps 2, 10, 11; ED eps 2, 9, 10)

node.description:
Roselia is an all-girl band in the BanG Dream! franchise. The group consists of five members:
- [Aina Aiba](https://anilist.co/staff/126659/Aina-Aiba) (as [Yukina Minato](https://anilist.co/character/128146/Yukina-Minato)) on vocals
- [Haruka Kudo](https://anilist.co/staff/95110/Haruka-Kudou) (as [Sayo Hikawa](https://anilist.co/character/126259/Sayo-Hikawa)) on guitar
- [Megu Sakuragawa](https://anilist.co/staff/115586/Megu-Sakuragawa) (as [Ako Udagawa](https://anilist.co/character/128144/Ako-Udagawa)) on drums
- [Kanon Shizaki](https://anilist.co/staff/129512/Kanon-Shizaki) (as [Rinko Shirokane](https://anilist.co/character/128143/Rinko-Shirokane)) on keyboard
- [Yuki Nakashima](https://anilist.co/staff/128152/Yuki-Nakashima) (as [Lisa Imai](https://anilist.co/character/128147/Lisa-Imai)) on bass

[Yurika Endou](https://anilist.co/staff/118480/Yurika-Endou) was the previous bassist and voice actor for Lisa up until May 2018, when she retired from the entertainment industry and was replaced with Nakashima.
[Satomi Akesaka](https://anilist.co/staff/95723/Satomi-Akesaka) was the previous keyboardist and Rinko's VA until September 2018, when she was forced to step down after suffering sudden deafness twice, and was replaced with Shizaki. 

Roselia's band name was coined from combining the words Rose and Camellia. They debuted with the song "BLACK SHOUT".

- [Kanon Shizaki](https://anilist.co/staff/129512/Kanon-Shizaki) (as [Rinko Shirokane](https://anilist.co/character/128143/Rinko-Shirokane)) on keyboard
- [Yuki Nakashima](https://anilist.co/staff/128152/Yuki-Nakashima) (as [Lisa Imai](https://anilist.co/character/128147/Lisa-Imai)) on bass

[Yurika Endou](https://anilist.co/staff/118480/Yurika-Endou) was the previous bassist and voice actor for Lisa up until May 2018, when she retired from the entertainment industry and was replaced with Nakashima.
[Satomi Akesaka](https://anilist.co/staff/95723/Satomi-Akesaka) was the previous keyboardist and Rinko's VA until September 2018, when she was forced to step down after suffering sudden deafness twice, and was replaced with Shizaki. 

Roselia's band name was coined from combining the words Rose and Camellia. They debuted with the song "BLACK SHOUT".

node.description:
Poppin'Party is an all-girl band in the BanG Dream! franchise. The group consists of five members:
- [Aimi](https://anilist.co/staff/109519/Aimi-Terakawa) (as [Kasumi Toyama](https://anilist.co/character/120229/)) on rhythm guitar and vocals
- [Sae Otsuka](https://anilist.co/staff/120235/) (as [Tae Hanazono](https://anilist.co/character/120232/)) on lead guitar
- [Rimi Nishimoto](https://anilist.co/staff/120234/Rimi-Nishimoto) (as [Rimi Ushigome](https://anilist.co/character/120231/)) on bass
- [Ayaka Ohashi](https://anilist.co/staff/110903/Ayaka-Ohashi) (as [Saaya Yamabuki](https://anilist.co/character/120233/)) on drums
- [Ayasa Itou](https://anilist.co/staff/118799/Ayasa-Itou) (as [Arisa Ichigaya](https://anilist.co/character/120230/)) on keyboard and tambourine

Poppin'Party first started out with Aimi, Rimi Nishimoto, and Ayasa Itou, before adding the other two members to become a full band. They debuted with the song "Yes! BanG_Dream!".

Poppin'Party is an all-girl band in the BanG Dream! franchise. The group consists of five members:
- [Aimi](https://anilist.co/staff/109519/Aimi-Terakawa) (as [Kasumi Toyama](https://anilist.co/character/120229/)) on rhythm guitar and vocals
- [Sae Otsuka](https://anilist.co/staff/120235/) (as [Tae Hanazono](https://anilist.co/character/120232/)) on lead guitar
- [Rimi Nishimoto](https://anilist.co/staff/120234/Rimi-Nishimoto) (as [Rimi Ushigome](https://anilist.co/character/120231/)) on bass
- [Ayaka Ohashi](https://anilist.co/staff/110903/Ayaka-Ohashi) (as [Saaya Yamabuki](https://anilist.co/character/120233/)) on drums
- [Ayasa Itou](https://anilist.co/staff/118799/Ayasa-Itou) (as [Arisa Ichigaya](https://anilist.co/character/120230/)) on keyboard and tambourine

Poppin'Party first started out with Aimi, Rimi Nishimoto, and Ayasa Itou, before adding the other two members to become a full band. They debuted with the song "Yes! BanG_Dream!".
_Note: Not to be confused with the [mangaka](https://anilist.co/staff/256771/)._
Tomomi Umetsu is a Japanese director, episode director and editor.
